items.title: Attack
content: Make a melee or ranged attack with your weapon
On hit, roll damage dice + modifiers
Critical hit on natural 20 (double damage dice)

items.title: Cast a Spell
items.content: Cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action. Follow the spell's description for effects.

items.title: Dash
items.content: Double your movement speed for the turn.

items.title: Disengage
items.content: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks for the rest of the turn.

items.title: Dodge
items.content: Until the start of your next turn, any attack roll made against you has disadvantage, and you make Dexterity saving throws with advantage.

items.title: Help
items.content: The creature you help gains advantage on the next ability check it makes to perform the task you are helping with. Alternatively, you can aid an ally attacking a creature, giving advantage on the next attack roll.

items.title: Hide
items.content: Make a Dexterity (Stealth) check to hide. You must have cover or be heavily obscured.

items.title: Ready
items.content: Prepare to take an action later, in response to a specific trigger. When the trigger occurs, you can use your reaction to take the readied action.

items.title: Search
items.content: Make a Wisdom (Perception) or Intelligence (Investigation) check to find something.

items.title: Use an Object
items.content: Use an item that requires an action to use, such as drinking a potion or activating a magic item.

items.title: Improvised Actions
items.content: Try using non-standard items or creative methods in combat (such as using a lantern as a bludgeon). Your DM may reward creative thinking with bonus effects or advantages.
